name: Serpent's Fang
description: A venomous strike that deals poison damage and has a chance to inflict the Poisoned condition.
tooltip: Deals 3-18 + 5 * DEX bonus nature damage. This spell has a chance to inflict the Poisoned2 condition and a +10% critical chance.
Poisoned 2: You take 2-12 nature damage at the start of your turn.
